languages.text: "Несмотря на проявленное вами милосердие, эти неблагодарные еретики бегут из ульев, оставляя рабочие посты, и подстрекают других! Они даже смеют клеветать, будто бы их используют, словно невольников — сколь неумны аппетиты этих вчерашних беглецов!"

"Despite your act of grace, these ungrateful heretics are fleeing the hives, abandoning their work stations, and inciting others to do the same! They even dare to spread lies and slander, stating they are being used as slaves — so great are the appetites of the yesterday's refugees!"
languages.original_text: "Несмотря на проявленное вами милосердие, эти неблагодарные еретики бегут из ульев, оставляя рабочие посты, и подстрекают других! Они даже смеют клеветать, будто бы их используют, словно невольников — сколь неумны аппетиты этих вчерашних беглецов!"

traits.locale_text: "Despite your act of grace, these ungrateful heretics are fleeing the hives, leaving their work stations, and inciting others! They even dare to spread slander as if they were being used as slaves — so great are the appetites of the yesterday's refugees!"

"Despite your act of grace, these ungrateful heretics are fleeing the hives, leaving their work stations, and inciting others! They even dare to spread slander as if they were being used as slaves — so great are the appetites of the yesterday's refugees!"

"Despite your act of grace, these ungrateful heretics are fleeing the hives, abandoning their work stations, and inciting others to do the same! They even dare to spread lies and slander, stating they are being used as slaves — so great are the appetites of the yesterday's refugees!"

"Despite your act of grace, these ungrateful heretics are fleeing the hives, abandoning their work stations, and inciting others to do the same! They even dare to spread lies and slander, stating they are being used as slaves — so great are the appetites of the yesterday's refugees!"

"Despite your act of grace, these ungrateful heretics are fleeing the hives, abandoning their work stations, and inciting others to do the same! They even dare to spread lies and slander, stating they are being used as slaves — so great are the appetites of the yesterday's refugees!"

languages.text: “这些忘恩负义的异端分子将您的仁慈视若无物。他们逃离了巢都，抛弃了自己的工作岗位，还煽动其他人也这么做！他们甚至还敢散布谣言，说他们被别人当成奴隶使唤。这群人明明昨天还是难民，今天就变得这么不知感恩！”
languages.original_text: "Despite your act of grace, these ungrateful heretics are fleeing the hives, abandoning their work stations, and inciting others to do the same! They even dare to spread lies and slander, stating they are being used as slaves — so great are the appetites of the yesterday's refugees!"

traits.locale_text: “这些忘恩负义的异端分子将您的仁慈视若无物。他们逃离了巢都，抛弃了自己的工作岗位，还煽动其他人也这么做！他们甚至还敢散布谣言，说他们被别人当成奴隶使唤。这群人明明昨天还是难民，今天就变得这么不知感恩！”

languages.text: «¡A pesar de tu acto de misericordia, estos herejes desagradecidos huyen de las colmenas, abandonan sus puestos de trabajo e incitan a otros a hacer lo mismo! Incluso se atreven a difundir mentiras y calumnias, afirmando que están siendo utilizados como esclavos. ¡Así de grandes son los apetitos de los refugiados del ayer!».
languages.original_text: "Despite your act of grace, these ungrateful heretics are fleeing the hives, abandoning their work stations, and inciting others to do the same! They even dare to spread lies and slander, stating they are being used as slaves — so great are the appetites of the yesterday's refugees!"

traits.locale_text: «¡A pesar de tu acto de misericordia, estos herejes desagradecidos huyen de las colmenas, abandonan sus puestos de trabajo e incitan a otros a hacer lo mismo! Incluso se atreven a difundir mentiras y calumnias, afirmando que están siendo utilizados como esclavos. ¡Así de grandes son los apetitos de los refugiados del ayer!».

languages.text: 「恩恵を受けているにもかかわらず、恩知らずの異端者たちはハイヴから逃げ出し、職場を放棄し、他の者たちにも同じことをするよう唆しているんだ！奴らは、自分たちが奴隷のようにこき使われていると、嘘をでっちあげ誹謗中傷を広めようとさえしている...近ごろの難民の貪欲さたるや、すさまじな！」
languages.original_text: "Despite your act of grace, these ungrateful heretics are fleeing the hives, abandoning their work stations, and inciting others to do the same! They even dare to spread lies and slander, stating they are being used as slaves — so great are the appetites of the yesterday's refugees!"

traits.locale_text: 「恩恵を受けているにもかかわらず、恩知らずの異端者たちはハイヴから逃げ出し、職場を放棄し、他の者たちにも同じことをするよう唆しているんだ！奴らは、自分たちが奴隷のようにこき使われていると、嘘をでっちあげ誹謗中傷を広めようとさえしている...近ごろの難民の貪欲さたるや、すさまじな！」

languages.text: « Malgré votre action de grâce, ces hérétiques abandonnent leurs postes et fuient les ruches, incitant les autres à en faire de même ! Ils vont même jusqu'à proférer des mensonges et des calomnies, affirmant qu'ils ont été réduits en esclavage ! Les réfugiés d'hier se montrent bien gourmands... »
languages.original_text: "Despite your act of grace, these ungrateful heretics are fleeing the hives, abandoning their work stations, and inciting others to do the same! They even dare to spread lies and slander, stating they are being used as slaves — so great are the appetites of the yesterday's refugees!"

traits.locale_text: « Malgré votre action de grâce, ces hérétiques abandonnent leurs postes et fuient les ruches, incitant les autres à en faire de même ! Ils vont même jusqu'à proférer des mensonges et des calomnies, affirmant qu'ils ont été réduits en esclavage ! Les réfugiés d'hier se montrent bien gourmands... »

languages.text: "Trotz Eures Akts der Gnade fliehen diese undankbaren Ketzer aus den Makropolen, lassen ihre Arbeit einfach liegen und stiften andere noch dazu an, es ihnen gleichzutun! Sie wagen es sogar, Lügen und Verleumdung zu verbreiten, indem sie behaupten, sie seine Sklaven — so groß ist die Gier derer, die gestern noch Flüchtlinge waren!"
languages.original_text: "Despite your act of grace, these ungrateful heretics are fleeing the hives, abandoning their work stations, and inciting others to do the same! They even dare to spread lies and slander, stating they are being used as slaves — so great are the appetites of the yesterday's refugees!"

traits.locale_text: "Trotz Eures Akts der Gnade fliehen diese undankbaren Ketzer aus den Makropolen, lassen ihre Arbeit einfach liegen und stiften andere noch dazu an, es ihnen gleichzutun! Sie wagen es sogar, Lügen und Verleumdung zu verbreiten, indem sie behaupten, sie seine Sklaven — so groß ist die Gier derer, die gestern noch Flüchtlinge waren!"

languages.text: "Onları bağışlamanıza rağmen bu nankör kâfirler, kovanlardan kaçarak iş istasyonlarını terk ediyor ve diğerlerini de aynını yapmaya teşvik ediyorlar! Hatta köle olarak kullanıldıklarını belirttiklerini yalanlarını ve iftiralarını yaymaya bile cüret ediyorlar. Dünkü mültecilerin iştahı dinmek bilmiyor!"
languages.original_text: "Despite your act of grace, these ungrateful heretics are fleeing the hives, abandoning their work stations, and inciting others to do the same! They even dare to spread lies and slander, stating they are being used as slaves — so great are the appetites of the yesterday's refugees!"
